description: Impose surface heat flux anomalies to the ocean, calculated from the ensemble mean of the 1pctCO2 simulations at the time of CO2 doubling.  Surface flux anomalies (a function of longitude, latitude and time of year) are to remain constant throughout the experiment.  Note that the fluxes themselves are not replaced because this would typically cause a very large climate drift and possible instability.
name: 1pctCO2HeatFluxAnomalyAtDoubling
longName: 1pctCO2 ensemble mean surface heat flux anomaly at time of CO2 doubling
keywords: FAFMIP, 1pctCO2, heat flux, 2xCO2, at CO2 doubling
